snippet: The officers were wounded when a bomb exploded on Monday as protesters near the capital called for the release of an activist on a two-month hunger strike, officials said.
abstract: Seven police officers are wounded when a bomb explodes as protesters near Bahrain's capital called for the released of jailed activist Abdulhadi al-Khawaja, who has been on a two-month hunger strike; Bahrain has ruled out sending Khawaja, who is also a Danish citizen, to Denmark for medical treatment, despite a request from the Danish government.
lead_paragraph: The officers were wounded when a bomb exploded on Monday as protesters near the capital called for the release of an activist on a two-month hunger strike, officials said.

headline.main: Bahrain: Blast Injures 7 Police Officers During Protest
headline.print_headline: Bahrain: Blast Injures 7 Police Officers During Protest
